So far it's never managed to be bootable even when partitioning off smaller areas like 30G rather than 3T, and it also isn't viewable without ghost when ghost booting off a USB. I've tried DOS and WINPE environments without luck.  
anyone have any advice for getting a 3TB external dive bootable? :/
